mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: le Peletier, Louis-Michel, marquis de Saint-Fargeau, 1760-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Assassinat de le Pelletier, Maison de Février restauranteur
Assassination of le Pelletier, restaurant Maison de Février
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A man wearing a cloak and hat stabs another man, presumably le Peletier, while witnesses exclaim. The action takes place in a plain room with long banquet tables around which people dine
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
